name: Doodle Sub
description:
How far can you get?
Captain your submarine through a deadly mine filled tunnel.

From the developer that brought you Doodle Sprint!

--------------------------------------

iTunes Reviews:

"Makes me smile!"

"Extremely addictive!"

"Best time killer ever!!!(:"

"I love it!!!"

--------------------------------------

Features:
• Gorgeous Retina Graphics
• Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements
• See your friends crashed sub as you pass there score
• Twitter and Facebook integration
• Awesome Sounds
• iCloud Sync
